news.title: Washed vs Natural: why it changes the taste
news.excerpt: Processing method can shift coffee from bright and clean to wild and fruity.

news.title: How roast level affects acidity and sweetness
news.excerpt: Light roasts keep acidity, darker roasts bring more bitterness and body.

news.title: Chemex vs V60: what to choose
news.excerpt: Chemex is cleaner, V60 is brighter and more expressive.
